idea-plugin.name: X.509 Cert Buddy
idea-plugin.description:
X.509 Cert Buddy is a toolkit that helps users manage X.509 certificates. It can extract certificates in Base64 and PEM format from json, xml, and text documents. It also allows users to drop DER, PEM, JSON, XML, and text files containing certificates. The toolkit will display the certificates in the correct trust hierarchy and permits users to copy PEM, Cert Chain PEM, Base64, or JSON containing all certificates. Furthermore, it enables the export of PEM, Cert Chain PEM, DER, or JSON containing all certificates. The toolkit can be used to convert between different X.509 certificate formats and offers the ability to view the certificate as text, ASN.1, or hex. Additionally, it allows users to validate the certificate.

In order to fully utilize the functionality of the toolkit, users need to have hexdump and openssl installed. Without these applications, not all information and functionality will be available. To use the plugin, use the action "Display Certs" to display all certificates and use the tool window to view certificate details, debug, and/or convert the certificates.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• Improved user interface, now more closely aligned with IntelliJ's design
  • Most buttons have been removed and replaced with actions, which can be found in the context menu of the tree view or the ToolWindow menu/title bar
  • Updated or added icons for better clarity and consistency
  • Added support for dropping DER-encoded X.509 certificates
  • Made the detail TextPane read-only to prevent accidental changes
  • Moved the "Read Cert" action to the editor context menu for easier access
  • Added the ability to export PEM certificates
  • Added the ability to copy and export PEM certificate chains
  • Added the ability to export certificates as DER-encoded files
  • Added the ability to copy and export all certificates to a JSON file
  • Added support for managing multiple projects
